rukus.text: elem tera ile-llezine yucadilune fi ayati-llah. enna yusrafun
ellezine kezzebu bilkitabi vebima erselna bihi rusulena. fesevfe ya`lemun
summe kile lehum eyne ma kuntum tusrikun
min duni-llah. kalu dallu `anna bel lem nekun ned`u min kablu sey'a. kezalike yudillu-llahu-lkafirin
zalikum bima kuntum tefrahune fi-l'ardi bigayri-lhakki vebima kuntum temrahun
udhulu ebvabe cehenneme halidine fiha. febi'se mesve-lmutekebbirin
fasbir inne va`de-llahi hakkun. feimma nuriyenneke ba`da-llezi ne`iduhum ev neteveffeyenneke feileyna yurce`un

velekad erselna rusulem min kablike minhum men kasasna `aleyke veminhum mel lem naksus `aleyk. vema kane lirasulin ey ye'tiye biayetin illa biizni-llah. feiza cae emru-llahi kudiye bilhakki vehasira hunalike-lmubtilun
